item.title: Plot Composition in ggplot
item.description: I recently came across a tweet by Mara Averick where she talked about patchwork, a library to help you arrange your ggplot outputs. Some fresh viz ✨ magic from @thomasp85 "patchwork: the composer of ggplots" https://t.co/FtSNVDmV42 #rstats #ggplot2 #dataviz pic.twitter.com/wjb4xJcF2W — Mara Averick (@dataandme) December 6, 2017 A Basic Example From Thomas’ Github page: Load Library library(ggplot2) library(patchwork) library(dplyr) Output p1 <- ggplot(mtcars) + geom_point(aes(mpg, disp)) p2 <- ggplot(mtcars) + geom_boxplot(aes(gear, disp, group = gear)) p1 + p2
